Improvements.Change_Diff:
- Map<String,ApiDoc> allMap=new HashMap<>(copyMap);
+ // Removed redundant HashMap initialisation
Improvements.Description: The HashMap 'allMap' is a redundant copy of 'copyMap'. You can directly use 'copyMap' to iterate over the entries.

Improvements.Improvement: Avoid calling expensive operations in loop
Improvements.Description: In the loop for 'copyMap.computeIfPresent', the size of the list is calculated every iteration. It's better to keep a count variable to avoid calling 'size()' repeatedly.
